subject: Colleges and Universities
Football (College)
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: Pleased with Penn State’s progress toward athletic integrity, the N.C.A.A. said on Tuesday that five football scholarships would be restored next year and more would be phased in afterward.
snippet: Pleased with Penn State’s progress toward athletic integrity, the N.C.A.A. said on Tuesday that five football scholarships would be restored next year and more would be phased in afterward.
